root.title: best bui bbui februari sale gain
root.body: best bui co inc sai sale februari rise five pct compar store basi 20.7 mln dlr 10.4 mln dlr year ago sai 11 month sale rise 213.4 mln dlr 101.2 mln dlr year earlier best bui sai sale current period base 23 retail facil compar 12 retail outlet year ago
